name: Run Politician Run Pro
description:
The great run by politician. He has decided to hold a "Jalsa" sitting at Committee Chowk but his opposition is trying to stop him by placing containers all around. Help him jump and make way to get to his venue. While playing the game avoid police barriers and other obstacles or you can get caught. This challenging game will test your reflexes, lets see how efficiently you can save the politician from getting caught. Click anywhere on screen to jump

**** Game Features ****
- Colorful & smooth graphics
- Easy one-touch controls and game play
- Rich background music and sound effects
- Intense and exciting game rhythm
- Explore the mysterious Committee Chowk ! ! !
- Face the unknown dangers and obstacles ! ! !

**** HOW TO PLAY ****
+Drag up to jump
+Drag left,right to change the lane
+Drag down to slide
+Tap to fire

have fun playing politician running game!!!
